// colored variant of https://shadertoy.com/view/wtsfWM

#define S(v) smoothstep( 9./R.y , 0. , v )          // AA draw

void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u )
{
    O = vec4(1);
    mat2 M = mat2(1,-1,1,1);                        // for 45Â° rotations
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy,
         U = 3. * ( 2.*u - R ) / R.y + iTime,
         I = floor( U * M ),                        // edge id (vec)
         F = ( fract(U) - .5 ) *M / 1.414, f;       // quad center to edge domain
    
    O -= .3* S( length(F) - .1 );                   // dots

    float r = fract(4e4*sin(I.y + 10.*I.x +99.));   // rand( edge id )
    r < .5
      ?  f = S( abs( F = abs(F) - .35 ) -.01 ),     //  X at edge
         O -= f.x + f.y,                            //    line
         f = S(F), O.gb -= .3 - .3* abs(f.x-f.y)    //    area
      :(                                            // )( at edge
         O -= S( abs( r = length(F) - .35 ) -.01 ), //    line
         O.gb -= .3*S(r) );                         //    area
}
